Room.Name: Eiden Public Storage Office
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the office of the Eiden Public Storage Facilities.
Room.LongDescription: This office is also a post office. You may send mail to Styx if you wish to purchase a storage room. The cost is $50k. You receive a key to a locked room and one storage chest which will hold 50 items. Additional chests cost $50k each, with a maximum of eight chests. Additional keys cost $2k each. the room is a one-player room, and is also a fast heal room.
